https://tmrev.io/movie/56012-Agatha Christie's The Pale Horse 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/HIyF3TOuQPSPmdpzRqfJoLqF1W.jpg Writer Mark Easterbrook has a vested interest in solving the murder of a priest. That's because Mark himself is under suspicion. But to save his reputation and put the real killer behind bars, he'll have to go through a mysterious list of names that's suddenly turned up and may hold the key to the murderer's identity. Agatha Christie's The Pale Horse
